description.english: Play hopscotch
description.german: Spiele Himmel und Hölle
description.french: Jouer à la marelle
description.spanish: Juega a la rayuela
description.japanese: ケンパー遊びをします
description.brazilian: Jogue amarelinha.

displayName.japanese: センセーショナルエントランス

description.english: Yank 10 doors open with the grapple hook
description.german: Brich 10 Türen mit dem Greifhaken auf
description.french: Arracher 10 portes avec le grappin
description.spanish: Abre 10 puertas con el gancho
description.japanese: グラップルフックでドアを10枚開けます
description.brazilian: Abra 10 portas à força com o gancho.

description.english: Make Sauge jump 100 times
description.german: Springe 100 Mal mit Sauge
description.french: Sauter 100 fois avec Sauge
description.spanish: Haz que Sauge salte 100 veces
description.japanese: サージュを100回ジャンプさせます
description.brazilian: Faça Sauge pular 100 vezes.

description.english: Drive 5km with the van
description.german: Fahre 5 km mit dem Bus
description.french: Parcourir un total de 5km en Van
description.spanish: Conduce 5 km con la furgoneta
description.schinese: 驾驶货车旅行总计5公里
description.japanese: バンを5キロ運転します
description.brazilian: Dirija 5 km com a van.

description.english: Meet all characters
description.german: Triff alle Charaktere
description.french: Rencontrer tous les personnages
description.spanish: Conoce a todos los personajes
description.japanese: すべてのキャラクターに会います
description.brazilian: Conheça todes les personagens.

displayName.japanese: サスペンションテスト

description.english: Use all springboards with the van
description.german: Benutze alle Sprungbretter mit dem Bus
description.french: Prendre tous les tremplins en Van
description.spanish: Usa todos los trampolines con la furgoneta
description.schinese: 开着货车使用所有跳板
description.japanese: バンですべての跳板を使います
description.brazilian: Use todos os trampolins com a van.

description.english: Spend more than one second in the air with the van
description.german: Bleibe mit dem Bus eine Sekunde in der Luft
description.french: Planer pendant plus d’une seconde dans les airs avec le Van
description.spanish: Pasa más de un segundo en el aire con la furgoneta
description.schinese: 驾驶货车在空中滞留超过1秒钟
description.japanese: バンで1秒以上宙に浮きます
description.brazilian: Passe mais de um segundo no ar com a van.

description.english: Step in the polluted sea
description.german: Steige ins verschmutzte Meer
description.french: Mettre les pieds dans la mer polluée
description.spanish: Métete en el mar contaminado
description.japanese: 汚染された海に足を踏み入れます
description.brazilian: Entre no mar poluído.

description.english: Collect your first component
description.german: Erhalte dein erstes Bauteil
description.french: Ramasser votre premier composant
description.spanish: Consigue tu primer componente
description.japanese: 最初の部品を集めます
description.brazilian: Colete seu primeiro componente.

description.english: Climb on the giant Reineto's head
description.german: Klettere auf den Kopf des Riesen-Reinetos
description.french: Monter sur la tête du Reineto géant
description.spanish: Ponte sobre la cabeza del Reineto gigante
description.schinese: 爬上巨型类人蛙的脑袋
description.japanese: 大レイネトの頭の上に登ります
description.brazilian: Suba na cabeça de Reineto gigante.

description.english: Score a goal
description.german: Schieß ein Tor
description.french: Marquer un but dans les cages
description.spanish: Mete un gol
description.japanese: ゴールを決めます
description.brazilian: Faça um gol.

description.english: Leave Space City and head to Cigalo
description.german: Fliege von der Raumstadt nach Cigalo
description.french: Quitter la Station en direction de Cigalo
description.spanish: Deja Ciudad Espacial y vete a Cigalo
description.schinese: 离开太空城，前往西加罗
description.japanese: スペースシティを離れ、シガロに向かいます
description.brazilian: Deixe a Cidade Espacial e vá para Cigalo.

description.english: Scan the surroundings with the antenna
description.german: Mach einen Scan mit der Antenne
description.french: Scanner l'environnement avec l’antenne
description.spanish: Escanea los alrededores con la antena
description.japanese: アンテナで周囲をスキャンします
description.brazilian: Vasculhe os arredores com a antena.

description.english: Yank a door open with the grapple hook
description.german: Brich eine Tür mit dem Greifhaken auf
description.french: Arracher une porte avec le grappin
description.spanish: Abre una puerta con el gancho
description.japanese: グラップルフックでドアを1枚開けます
description.brazilian: Abra uma porta à força com o gancho.

description.english: Hack a device with the antenna
description.german: Hacke ein Gerät mit der Antenne
description.french: Hacker un appareil avec l’antenne
description.spanish: Piratea un dispositivo con la antena
description.japanese: アンテナを使って機器をハッキングします
description.brazilian: Hackeie um dispositivo com a antena.

description.english: Use a zipline with the motorized pulley
description.german: Überquere ein Drahtseil mit der elektrischen Laufkatze
description.french: Prendre une tyrolienne avec la poulie motorisée
description.spanish: Usa una tirolina con la polea motorizada
description.japanese: 電動プーリーを使ってジップラインを移動します
description.brazilian: Use uma tirolesa com a roldana motorizada.

description.english: Power a system with the grapple hook
description.german: Versorge ein Gerät über den Greifhaken mit Strom
description.french: Alimenter un système avec le grappin énergétique
description.spanish: Activa un sistema con el gancho
description.japanese: グラップルフックでシステムに電力を供給します
description.brazilian: Alimente um sistema com energia usando o gancho.

description.english: Go look for Nèfle inside the TARAASK with Rose
description.german: Suche in der TARAASK mit Rose nach Nèfle
description.french: Partir à la recherche de Nèfle dans la TARAASK avec Rose
description.spanish: Ve a buscar a Nèfle dentro de la TARAASK con Rose
description.schinese: 和萝丝出发前往轨道光电炮，寻找奈芙拉
description.japanese: ローズと一緒に、TARAASKの中にいるネフレを探しに行きます
description.brazilian: Procure por Nèfle dentro da TARAASK com Rose.

description.english: Meet with Garance's consciousness
description.german: Triff Garances Bewusstsein
description.french: Rencontrer la conscience de Garance
description.spanish: Reúnete con la consciencia de Garance
description.japanese: ガランスの意識と会います
description.brazilian: Encontre a consciência de Garance.

description.english: Make the safe choice for both Nèfle and Sauge
description.german: Triff die sichere Entscheidung für Nèfle und Sauge
description.french: Choisir la sécurité, Nèfle et Sauge sont sains et saufs
description.spanish: Elige la opción segura para Nèfle y para Sauge
description.schinese: 英明决断，救奈芙拉和索热脱险
description.japanese: ネフレとサージュにとって安全な選択をします
description.brazilian: Faça a escolha mais segura tanto para Nèfle quanto Sauge.

description.english: Destroy all signal jammers and reveal the entire map
description.german: Zerstörer alle Störsender und decke die ganze Karte auf
description.french: Détruire tous les brouilleurs pour révéler la carte
description.spanish: Destruye todos los inhibidores de frecuencia y revela todo el mapa
description.schinese: 摧毁所有信号干扰器并解锁全地图
description.japanese: 信号妨害装置をすべて破壊して、マップ全体を明らかにします
description.brazilian: Destrua todos os emissores de ruído e revele o mapa completo.

description.english: Discover all the points of interest
description.german: Finde alle wesentlichen Orte auf der Karte
description.french: Découvrir tous les points d’intérêts
description.spanish: Descubre todos los puntos de interés
description.japanese: すべての関心地点を探索します
description.brazilian: Descubra todos os pontos de interesse.

description.english: Complete all the tasks given to Sauge
description.german: Erfülle sämtliche Aufgaben, die Sauge bekommt
description.french: Effectuer toutes les tâches confiées à Sauge
description.spanish: Completa todas las tareas de Sauge
description.schinese: 完成交给索热的所有支线任务
description.japanese: サージュに与えられたタスクをすべて完了します
description.brazilian: Complete todas as tarefas confiadas a Sauge.

description.english: Unlock all van cosmetics
description.german: Spiele sämtliche Cosmetics für den Bus frei
description.french: Débloquer tous les cosmétiques du van
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los objetos cosméticos de la furgoneta
description.japanese: バンの装飾アイテムをすべてアンロックします
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os itens cosméticos da van

description.english: Collect 500 components
description.german: Sammle 500 Bauteile
description.french: Récolter 500 composants
description.spanish: Consigue 500 componentes
description.japanese: 部品を500個集めます
description.brazilian: Colete 500 componentes.

description.english: Visit all locations on Cigalo
description.german: Besuche alle Regionen in Cigalo
description.french: S’être rendu dans tous les lieux de Cigalo
description.spanish: Visita todas las ubicaciones de Cigalo
description.japanese: シガロのすべての場所を訪ねます
description.brazilian: Visite todas as localidades de Cigalo.
